mdRecord.dcterms:title: Largest Tree in Floyd, 35 Feet Circumference, Owned By W.M. Harman 1913
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1285_Largest Tree 1913 Floyd ID; "Lula Dickerson in largest hat, son Haskew bottom right." Rear: Mrs. Gordon Harman, Hannah Keith, Ida Earles Moore, ?, ?, Nova Harman, Mrs. Walter Dickerson. Lula Dickerson, Lydie Harman Terry or Mrs. Len Keith, Len Keith, Gordon Harman, "uncle" Jake Wa Dickerson Sunday outing group pictured in front of largest tree and sign in vicinity of Red Oak Grove
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
